definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning

sentences.english: The city walls lie in front, at the back it overlooks the Appennines.
sentences.chinese: 城牆位於酒店前面而酒店背部則俯瞰亞平寧山脈。

sentences.english: A region of central Italy in the Apennines.
sentences.chinese: 翁布里亞亞平寧半島意大利中部的一個寺區。
